B2 the act or process of taking part in something: The team's continued involvement in the competition is uncertain. Being on the committee is one involvement I could do without.
a romantic or sexual relationship: She spoke openly about her involvement with the former prime minister.
More examplesFewer examplesWe have decreased our involvement in children's books.He denied that he had any direct involvement in the deal.The decision to escalate UN involvement has been taken in the hopes of a swift end to the hostilities.His involvement with the project began when he was on (a) secondment from NASA to the European Space Agency.Community involvement is central to our plan.
